courts.bookingError: It is not possible to proceed with your reservation, please check the dates and ensure you have not booked on that day previously.
courts.bookingSuccess: Your reservation has been saved successfully. Enjoy your game.
courts.invalidBookMsgError1: Your urbanization has not yet enabled the use of this application for booking.
courts.invalidBookMsgError2: You have received the letter and successfully created an account, let's give other users time to register.
courts.invalidBookMsgError3: Refer to the received letter for more information about the date when the system comes into effect.
courts.confirmBookQuestion: Are you sure you want to book?
courts.forgetBookTime: Don't forget to select the booking time
